channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Social Security’s COLA could be lowest since 2021, pressuring seniors’ budgets
item.description: The 2026 Social Security cost-of-living-adjustment is projected to be 2.4%.

item.title: Under Armour’s stock drops as company skips annual guidance due to uncertainty around trade and the economy
item.description: Sports apparel giant expects a slight first-quarter profit, while Wall Street was expecting a breakeven quarter

item.title: Trump should aim for zero tariffs. It could usher in a golden age for Americans.
item.description: How “tariff zero” would expand opportunities for American exporters and help U.S. companies sell to the world.

item.title: How trade wars and tariffs could put stock dividends on the chopping block
item.description: Companies will slash dividend payouts to make up for lost revenue.

item.title: Shelter from inflation? CPI not showing much sign of it lately.
item.description: Rents and home prices aren’t going up like crazy anymore, but they are still one of the biggest sources of U.S. inflation.

item.title: Coinbase's entry into S&P 500 is a watershed moment for crypto industry, analysts say
item.description: On Monday evening, S&P Dow Jones Indices said Coinbase will be added to the benchmark S&P 500 stock index before trading begins on May 19.

item.title: An improving market outlook makes this oil refiner a buy, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: A more upbeat oil market outlook could lead to more upside for shares of this refiner, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: CNS Pharmaceuticals Soars Over 100% on $5 Million Offering: What’s Driving the Surge?

item.title: Next move in U.S.-China trade truce could boost these 2 major chip stocks, Piper Sandler says
item.description: The recent suspension of U.S.-China tariffs for 90 days could translate into future gains for two chipmakers, according to Piper Sandler.

item.title: Raymond James says this AI-related stock is a buy with more than 20% upside
item.description: The artificial intelligence boom should drive shares of this server maker higher in the months ahead, according to Raymond James.

item.title: An options strategy to play a potential rebound in this beaten down delivery giant
item.description: For this trade, I'm taking a contrarian stance on this beaten-down name, especially as the technical charts start to hint at a possible bounce.
